Sanemori's Explanation

(実盛物語) (Sanemori monogatari)

Performance: October 1974: The Nunobiki Waterfall

Production: October 1974

Narrators:

Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))

Shamisen (Musicians):

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))
